column2: caption="Lindórië of Númenor" by [[:Category:Images by Elawen Altariel

column1: }}'''Lindórië''' was one of the [[Faithful]] of [[Númenor]], being the daughter of the fourteenth [[Lords of Andúnië
column2: Lord of Andúnië]] (and the sister of [[Eärendur (Lord of Andúnië)
column3: Eärendur]], the fifteenth Lord of that line).

column1: Lindórië was born during the dark times of Númenor when the Númenorians, led by their [[Kings of Númenor
column2: Kings]] were turning against the [[Valar]]. However she belonged to the [[Faithful]] and instilled her beliefs in her daughter [[Inzilbêth]], who passed these beliefs on to her elder son [[Inziladûn]]. Due to this upbringing, when Lindórië's grandson took the [[Sceptre of Númenor]], he adopted the name [[Tar-Palantir]] in [[Quenya]] and attempted to reverse the influences of the [[King's Men]].<ref>{{S

column1: Lindórië's name is [[Quenya]], but its meaning is hard to deduce with certainty. It may come from the roots ''[[linda]]'' 'fair', ''-[[órë]]'' 'rising'; or perhaps ''[[rië]]'' 'crown' and ''-[[ië]]'', a suffix verb form used as an adjective; "Rising Beauty" or "High Crown of Fair Beauty" (i.e. 'golden-haired').{{fact}}
